title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, September 16, 2021
description: Lauren Bacall was born Betty Joan Perske on this day in New York City (1924). She met Humphrey Bogart in the 1944 movie “To Have and Have Not” and later married him.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Lauren Bacall was born Betty Joan Perske on this day in New York City (1924). She met Humphrey Bogart in the 1944 movie “To Have and Have Not” and later married him.
